Sentencas: This article presents an advanced power generation system that integrates a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) module with a recuperated supercritical CO2 (s-CO2) cycle.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimisation of a power generation system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and recuperated supercritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: The waste heat generated by the exhaust of the SOFC module is utilised to drive the s-CO2 cycle, resulting in enhanced energy efficiency.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimisation of a power generation system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and recuperated supercritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: The performance of the system was investigated through thermodynamic and economic analyses and optimised using response surface methodology.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimisation of a power generation system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and recuperated supercritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: The optimisation process focused on two objectives: maximising the energy efficiency of the integrated system and minimising the levelised cost of electricity.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimisation of a power generation system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and recuperated supercritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: The study meticulously analysed the effects of important variables such as current density, fuel utilisation factor, and operating temperature of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimisation of a power generation system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and recuperated supercritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: The optimisation efforts yielded impressive results, achieving an energy efficiency of 64% and a levelised cost of electricity (LCOE) of 0.18 & POUND;/kWh.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimisation of a power generation system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and recuperated supercritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: The proposed system surpassed traditional natural gas-fuelled power plants in terms of efficiency and specific emissions.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimisation of a power generation system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and recuperated supercritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: Furthermore, the system's performance was evaluated when operated with green hydrogen fuel, which led to a substantial improvement in efficiency, estimated at 73.37%.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimisation of a power generation system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and recuperated supercritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: However, it was found that the LCOE of the system is relatively higher and approximately 15% higher than the methane-based alternative.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimisation of a power generation system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and recuperated supercritical carbon dioxide cycle
